name: Fly Simulator
description:
Confrontation Of Flies and HumansYou work as a waiter and lead an uphill battle for your clients. You pushing back the flies from the food, otherwise you'll never get anything. Maybe are you a hungry insect trying to increase your population? Choose the opposing side. The war is already underway.Features
  • Up to 10 flies vs. 1 person
  • Various weapons to fight the flies
  • The growth of flies to a giant size
  • Try yourself in the role of waiter
